title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Deploy Quick Suite at scale with confidence and control (BIZ225)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 大规模部署 Quick Suite，充满信心与掌控力 (BIZ225)
abstract: Learn how enterprise deployment strategies enable Quick Suite scale while maintaining security and operational excellence. Through a compelling customer story, discover how leading organizations have successfully deployed  AI agents, automation, and business intelligence capabilities of Quick Suite across global operations while meeting strict regulatory requirements. Explore identity management integration, access control patterns, and governance frameworks. Discover monitoring and audit strategies that ensure proper oversight while enable business agility across multi-account and cross-region deployments.
abstract_cn: 了解企业部署策略如何在保持安全性和卓越运营的同时实现 Quick Suite 的规模化。通过引人入胜的客户案例，探索领先组织如何在满足严格监管要求的同时，成功地在全球运营中部署 Quick Suite 的 AI 代理、自动化和商业智能能力。探索身份管理集成、访问控制模式和治理框架。了解监控和审计策略，这些策略可确保在多账户和跨区域部署中实现适当监督的同时支持业务敏捷性。

presenter.name: Emily Zhu
presenter.title: Sr. Product Manager, Amazon Quick Suite, AWS
